pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'jQuery QueryBuilder' Input for 'Shiny' // A highly configurable 'jQuery' plugin offering a simple interface to create complex queries/filters in 'Shiny'. The outputted rules can easily be parsed into a set of 'R' and/or 'SQL' queries and used to filter data. Custom parsing of the rules is also supported. For more information about 'jQuery QueryBuilder' see https://querybuilder.js.org/.
